channel.title: Rs on 润航的军火库
channel.description: Recent content in Rs on 润航的军火库

item.title: Query and Summary Data
item.description: cars is a dataset already exist in R when you download R Let’s use cars as an example to familarize some basic function for querying data in R head(cars) #first couple of lines in the data ## speed dist ## 1 4 2 ## 2 4 10 ## 3 7 4 ## 4 7 22 ## 5 8 16 ## 6 9 10 tail(cars) #last couple of lines in the data ## speed dist ## 45 23 54 ## 46 24 70 ## 47 24 92 ## 48 24 93 ## 49 24 120 ## 50 25 85 colnames(cars) #column names ## [1] "speed" "dist" dim(cars) #dimensions of the dataset (first number is number of rows, second number is number of columns) ## [1] 50 2 ncol(cars) #number of columns ## [1] 2 nrow(cars) #number of rows ## [1] 50 str(cars) #structure of the object ## 'data.

item.title: Visualize Your Data(壹)
item.description: data<-read.csv("primates data.csv") data ## When we look at this data, we can see there are a lot of NA and we want to get rid of them ## Spp Bodywt Brainwt ## 1 Potar monkey 10.0 115 ## 2 Gorilla 207.0 406 ## 3 Human 62.0 1320 ## 4 Rhesus monkey 6.8 179 ## 5 Chimp 52.2 440 ## 6 NA NA ## 7 NA NA ## 8 NA NA ## 9 NA NA ## 10 NA NA ## 11 NA NA ## 12 NA NA ## 13 NA NA vec=is.
